meanings.definition: A type of media content that combines information and entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The infotainment on the TV show taught me about animals while keeping me entertained.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching infotainment programs that educate me about history and science.
meanings.sent3: The infotainment segment on the news made me laugh with its funny facts.
meanings.sent4: Her presentation was like infotainment, blending facts with humor seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The infotainment documentary on space exploration was both educational and engaging.

meanings.definition: The act of providing information in an entertaining manner.
meanings.sent1: The infotainment at the museum made learning about art fun and interesting.
meanings.sent2: The infotainment at the event kept the audience engaged and informed.
meanings.sent3: His infotainment style of teaching made the class enjoyable and informative.
meanings.sent4: The infotainment session at the conference was a hit, combining facts with humor.
meanings.sent5: The infotainment podcast on science made complex topics easy to understand and enjoyable.
